meanings.definition: The act of applying a decorative metallic finish to an object.
meanings.sent1: The chromings on the car made it shine brightly in the sun.
meanings.sent2: She admired the chromings on the antique mirror.
meanings.sent3: The chromings on the bicycle made it look like a shiny new toy.
meanings.sent4: The artist's chromings transformed the plain vase into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The chromings on the jewelry sparkled like tiny stars.

meanings.definition: The process of adding color to a black-and-white photograph.
meanings.sent1: He learned how to do chromings on old family photos.
meanings.sent2: The chromings brought life to the historic black-and-white images.
meanings.sent3: The chromings on the picture made it look like a scene from a dream.
meanings.sent4: Her chromings turned the dull photo into a vibrant memory.
meanings.sent5: The chromings on the photograph made the past feel alive.

meanings.definition: The act of browsing the internet using Google Chrome.
meanings.sent1: She enjoyed her chromings on the web with Google Chrome.
